definitions.definition: The support of advocacy of a union , especially of a trade union .
Support for the North (the Union ) during the American Civil War .
Support for the continuance of the United Kingdom (especially with respect to Northern Ireland ).

main_definition: The support of advocacy of a union , especially of a trade union .
secondary_definitions: ( often capitalized ) Support for the North (the Union ) during the American Civil War .
( often capitalized ) Support for the continuance of the United Kingdom (especially with respect to Northern Ireland ).
